thread.title: California Treasurer Calls for Wells Fargo CEO Removal Amid ‘Laundry List of Misdeeds’

author: Emily Glazer
title: California Treasurer Calls for Wells Fargo CEO Removal Amid ‘Laundry List of Misdeeds’

organizations.name: california treasurer calls for wells fargo

text:
California State Treasurer John Chiang called for the removal of & Co. Chief Executive Timothy Sloan on Monday, citing the bank’s widespread problems. Mr. Chiang, who has been voicing his frustrations since Wells Fargo’s sales practices scandal erupted in September 2016, described the bank as one that “reeks of betrayal” and is a “shadow of […]
  WSJ City PM: Fun Already Fading for Banks, Dollar Still Top Dog Despite Others' Efforts
